data.title: Silver Spring Foods Specialty Mustards
data.meta_description: Silver Spring Foods horseradish products are a delicious way to zing up breakfast, lunch or dinner. Check out all the available products and flavors!
data.text:
Add a comment: Beer 'n Brat Mustard

Beer 'n Brat Mustard

9.5 oz. Bottle | GiveItZing®

Bratwurst? More like bratbest.

Whether you’re grilling in the summer or tailgating in the fall, this tangy taste sensation delivers the extra dose of heat your link’s been missing. With bold flavor and sizzling spiciness, our Beer ‘n Brat Mustard makes traditional condiments just look, well, yellow.

Flavor Profile

The texture is more coarse than yellow or dijon mustard with eye-watering heat and a broad range of mustard flavors.

Heat Level

Pairs well with…

Bratwurst and sauerkraut

Deli-style sandwiches

Summer sausage

Deviled eggs

Pretzels and beer

Product description

Ingredients

Recipes

Comments

Bratwurst never had it so good with this blend of fresh ground horseradish and hearty mustard. Our Beer’n Brat Mustard is the perfect sinus-clearing secret ingredient for everyday recipes, or makes a great standalone condiment that’ll empty the plate. Beer’n Brat Mustard brings eye-watering heat that can liven up more than just bratwurst. It also pairs fantastically with deli sandwiches, summer sausage, deviled eggs, or even a simple bowl of pretzels and beer. Gluten-Free product from Silver Spring.

FIND US AT: INSTACART
